name: Evas10n
description:
Evas10n 10-Liner BASIC Breakout for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum

Evas10n is a clone of the classic Breakout action game, written in 20 lines of BASIC (max 80 chars per line) for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum homecomputer. You can either download it for use with an emulator or a real ZX Spectrum or play it in your browser (powered by JSSpeccy emulator by Matt Westcott; keyboard is required).

Controls: z: left; x: right.

Evas10n is my entry to the 2020 edition of the BASIC 10Liner Contest, "PUR-80" category.

Read more on marco's retrobits blog.
